mapper.select: SELECT model_series,quality_problem_1.plane_type,CONCAT(year(remodel_date),'-',QUARTER(remodel_date)) createTime, fault_model,count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,equipment_design_data WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type=equipment_design_data.plane_type GROUP BY plane_type,model_series, fault_model order by createTime

SELECT model_series,CONCAT(year(dev_happen_time),'-',QUARTER(dev_happen_time)) createTime,count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,equipment_design_data WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type=equipment_design_data.plane_type GROUP BY createTime,model_series order by createTime

SELECT quality_problem_1.plane_type,CONCAT(year(dev_happen_time),'-',QUARTER(dev_happen_time)) createTime,count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,equipment_design_data WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type=equipment_design_data.plane_type GROUP BY createTime,quality_problem_1.plane_type order by createTime

SELECT parts_name,parts_model,CONCAT(year(modify_time),'-',QUARTER(modify_time)) createTime, fault_model,count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,product_modify_4 WHERE quality_problem_1.parts_model = product_modify_4.product_model GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model order by createTime

SELECT parts_name,parts_model,install_method, fault_model,count(*) sum,CONCAT(year(dev_happen_time),'-',QUARTER(dev_happen_time)) createTime FROM quality_problem_1,product_design_3 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = product_design_3.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = product_design_3.finished_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = product_design_3.finished_model GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,install_method order by createTime

SELECT parts_name,parts_model,CONCAT(frame,'/',upper_middle_lower,'/',left_middle_right) installWhere, fault_model,count(*) sum,CONCAT(year(dev_happen_time),'-',QUARTER(dev_happen_time)) createTime FROM quality_problem_1,product_design_3 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = product_design_3.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = product_design_3.finished_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = product_design_3.finished_model GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,installWhere order by createTime

SELECT parts_name,count(*) sum,CONCAT(year(dev_happen_time),'-',QUARTER(dev_happen_time)) createTime FROM quality_problem_1,product_modify_4 WHERE quality_problem_1.parts_name = product_modify_4.product_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = product_modify_4.product_model GROUP BY parts_name,createTime order by createTime

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, parts_make_group, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_make_num_9 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_make_num_9.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_make_num_9.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_make_num_9.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_make_num_9.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,parts_make_group

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, parts_make_people, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_make_num_9 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_make_num_9.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_make_num_9.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_make_num_9.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_make_num_9.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,parts_make_people

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, parts_make_quipment, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_make_num_9 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_make_num_9.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_make_num_9.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_make_num_9.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_make_num_9.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,parts_make_quipment

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, parts_measuring_quipment, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_make_num_9 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_make_num_9.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_make_num_9.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_make_num_9.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_make_num_9.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,parts_measuring_quipment

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, raw_material_place, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_make_num_9 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_make_num_9.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_make_num_9.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_make_num_9.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_make_num_9.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,raw_material_place

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, spare_parts_place, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_make_num_9 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_make_num_9.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_make_num_9.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_make_num_9.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_make_num_9.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,spare_parts_place

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, parts_make_workmanship, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_make_num_9 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_make_num_9.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_make_num_9.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_make_num_9.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_make_num_9.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,parts_make_workmanship

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, parts_repair_group, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_repair_num_13 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_repair_num_13.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_repair_num_13.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_repair_num_13.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_repair_num_13.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,parts_repair_group

SELECT quality_problem_1.parts_name, quality_problem_1.parts_model, parts_make_workmanship, fault_model, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1,parts_repair_num_13 WHERE quality_problem_1.plane_type = parts_repair_num_13.plane_type and quality_problem_1.parts_name = parts_repair_num_13.parts_name and quality_problem_1.parts_model = parts_repair_num_13.parts_model and quality_problem_1.parts_code = parts_repair_num_13.parts_code GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model, fault_model,parts_make_workmanship

SELECT parts_name, parts_model, CONCAT(year(dev_happen_time),'-',QUARTER(dev_happen_time)) createTime, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY parts_name,parts_model,createTime order by createTime
SELECT plane_type, SUM(CONVERT(flight_hours,DECIMAL)) sum, CONCAT(year(date),'-',QUARTER(date)) createTime FROM equipment_use_data_12 GROUP BY plane_type,createTime order by createTime
SELECT plane_type, SUM(CONVERT(flight_hours,DECIMAL)) sum, year(date) createTime FROM equipment_use_data_12 GROUP BY plane_type,createTime order by createTime
SELECT plane_type, CONCAT(year(dev_happen_time),'-',QUARTER(dev_happen_time)) createTime, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY plane_type,createTime order by createTime
SELECT plane_type, year(dev_happen_time) createTime, count(*) sum FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY plane_type,createTime order by createTime
SELECT model_series FROM equipment_design_data GROUP BY model_series
SELECT plane_type FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY plane_type
SELECT fault_model FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY fault_model
SELECT parts_name FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY parts_name
SELECT capability_status FROM equipment_manufacturing_data5 GROUP BY capability_status order by capability_status
SELECT CONCAT(plane_type,';',dev_code) createTime FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY createTime
SELECT CONCAT(parts_name,'/',parts_model) createTime FROM quality_problem_1 GROUP BY createTime
